column2: "Looks... like... we did it..."
"Arr, ye pulled it off. Looks like I weren't givin' the two o' ye enough credit."
"Never mind us, is he okay?"
"Aye, nary a scratch on 'im. Both of us ship-shape and ready to sail!"
"Looks like we solved the mystery of the distress signal. He must have stepped on it."
"But I wonder what ARKS equipment was doing here in the first place?"
"Listen, missy. I reckon I owe ye some thanks."
"What? I don't think I really did that much, did I?"
"No, ye've done us a great service 'ere."
"It's clear t'see that ye don't 'ave much talent. T'be frank, sometimes yer so bad it's 'ard to watch ye."
"Spare me the details."
"Still, ye did yer best regardless. An' thanks t'ye, we found what we were lookin' for."
"So, I 'ope ye'll accept me gratitude."
"Ah, don't let yerself get too cocky, though. Else we'll be lucky if the two of us 'ere are the only victims."
"Oy! Watch it! What are ye-!?"
"Oh, sorry, I could have sworn there was an enemy right there."
"Open yer eyes, ye daft wench!"
"Shut up! We found your stupid little pal here, so how about you hurry up and get out of my face?"
"Aye, ye don't need t' tell me twice. See if I ever thank ye again!"
"Fine! You're welcome!"
"Whew, what a day. Well, let's head back."
"You can now call Echo (Hunter) as a partner."
"His Will Inherited"
"第1章 受け継がれる意志"
